channel.title: Space Debris on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Space Debris on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The military’s squad of satellite trackers is now routinely going on alert
item.description: “I hope this blows your mind because it blows my mind.”

item.title: Ars spoke with the military’s chief orbital traffic cop—here’s what we learned
item.description: “We have some 2,000 or 2,200 objects that I call the ‘red order of battle.’”

item.title: Nearly everyone opposes Trump’s plan to kill space traffic control program
item.description: Space Force officials and more than 450 aerospace companies are against the White House’s proposal.
